about_the_game:
"

Pathfinder 2 RPG - Core Rules - Syrinscape Sound Link Pack

Syrinscape Sound Link Packs for Fantasy Grounds work with your Syrinscape Super Syrin subscription to provide you context-specific sounds for weapon attacks, casting of spells, and damage types for content in the Pathfinder 2nd Edition Core Rules.  The collection of Sound Sets can be created for free within the Fantasy Grounds Unity sound interface, but this pack has done all the work for you to link the content. Appropriate sounds from Syrinscape will trigger automatically based on attacks (hit, miss, critical success, critical failure), damage dealt, or the spell being cast.
This pack include sounds sets, separated into the following categories:
  • Attack/Item Triggers (crossbow, longsword, club, etc.)
  • Damage Triggers (acid, cold, fire, force, mental, positive, negative, sonic, slashing, etc)
  • Death Triggers
  • Spells
"
